meanings.definition: To observe or monitor for a specific purpose
meanings.sent1: The scientist will surveil the experiment to ensure accurate results.
meanings.sent2: It is important to surveil the patient's condition after surgery.
meanings.sent3: I like to surveil the progress of my plants to see how they grow each day.
meanings.sent4: The teacher would surveil the students during the test, making sure no one cheated.
meanings.sent5: The security camera was placed strategically to surveil the entrance of the building.
